briefdescription.para: x component of the Vec2

simplesect.para: I've made this public as some compilers automatically make the anonymous unions public whereas clang++ complains see this post http://jonmacey.blogspot.com/2011/03/anonymous-union-struct-weirdness.html

briefdescription.para: y component of the Vec2
array of four floats mapped to the x,y,z,w components of the Vec2 useful for openGL fv data types this is mapped as a union to the following m_x == m_openGL[0] m_y == m_openGL[1]

briefdescription.para: accesor to the m_openGL matrix returns the address of the 0th element
simple Vec2 encapsulates a 3 float object like glsl Vec2 but not maths use the Vec2 class for maths and the asVec2 to return a Vec2
